title: Santa's Taxi - Sat 28 November 2015
desc: Back by popular demand, Santa and his Taxi are at Ealing Broadway Shopping Centre from 21 Nov - 21 Dec. Meet Santa in his bright white taxi and capture the moment with a photo of Santa himself and all the family. All visitors receive a printed photo, and you can head to the Ealing Broadway Shopping Cente Facebook page to download and share your electronic copy with friends and family. This is a free activity. We will be collecting donations to split across a number of local charities. For more on this, visit our website  .
